channel.title: Freaky Friday on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Freaky Friday on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”
item.description: Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons and Manny Jacinto also star in Nisha Ganatra’s comedy, which picks up with the characters based on Mary Rodgers’ classic children’s novel two decades later.

item.title: ‘Freakier Friday’ Review: Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan Struggle to Rekindle the Body-Swap Magic in Shrill “Freakquel”
item.description: Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons and Manny Jacinto also star in Nisha Ganatra’s comedy, which picks up with the characters based on Mary Rodgers’ classic children’s novel two decades later.

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”

item.title: Lindsay Lohan Wants to Do “Some More Serious, Dramatic Roles” After ‘Freakier Friday’
item.description: The star reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for the ‘Freaky Friday’ sequel, then is looking to “really show people a different side of me.”
